name: BOSQUES SIN FRONTERAS
goal: Forest without borders is a non-profit organization that seeks the improvement, conservation and dissemination of trees. To do this goals, we carry out positive projects and activities that put value on trees, as the contest ARBOL AND FOREST OF THE YEAR we have been doing since 2010, the series of STORIES FROM THE FOREST for children from 6 to 11 years old and the travel program HUG THE TREES.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Education, Environment
euInitiatives: We collaborate with some Europen Organizations like EUROPEAN CHAMPION TREE and european LIFE + projects like QUICK URBAN FOREST. We would like to collaborate with European Union to get more sensitivity and awareness between European Citizens in relation with trees. We think we need more awareness about trees especially in Mediterraneam European Countries.
